issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

fields.summary: Slow service DNS response when account is non eucalyptus

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Slow response when using DNS service endpoints
fields.environment:
{noformat}
NETWORK	EDGE
10.111.1.127	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[CLC]
10.111.1.127	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[WS]

comments.body:
[~shaon]

Can you retest while pointing directly at the CLC as your DNS server?
When I change the DNS server directory to CLC the response time gets back to normal.
It was an issue with DNS.

Verified. Response time is normal with DNS endpoints.

Installed Packages
{noformat}
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.2.0
Release     : 0.0.23526.512.20150615git6ece1b8.el6
{noformat}
